name: Start
intro: You're finally awake from your cryosleep. You may not remember, but you're on a ship headed for Earth. As resources are running low, the rest of the crew remains preserved in their cryopods. You alone are responsible for guiding me to get the ship home safely to Earth to deliver cargo that is crucial for the planet's survival.

name: Asteroids
intro: We are approaching a dangerous asteroid belt. You can choose to avoid the asteroids, but that will take time, perhaps too much time. Navigating through the belt is more direct, but there is much greater risk of damage. Which do you choose? Avoid or direct?

name: Asteroids-Avoid
intro: We avoided immediate danger by taking the longer, but safer, route around the asteroid belt. Gas and oxygen are running low, but we continue to make our way towards Earth.

name: Asteroids-Direct
intro: You have chosen to find a direct route through the dangerous asteroid belt. We will have to hope that the ship does not take too much damage. I can provide reports upon request.

name: Earth
intro: Our mission has succeeded! You have saved the day by returning to Earth just in time. I approve of your strategic thinking.

name: Death
intro: Our mission has failed. The ship, disabled, floats through space as the life support systems slowly shut down.....
